title: Modern Blue Table Lamp
description: Sleek contemporary table lamp with blue ceramic base and white fabric shade. Perfect for modern living rooms and bedrooms. Provides warm ambient lighting with energy-efficient LED bulb included. Height: 24 inches.

title: Ergonomic Office Chair Black
description: Premium ergonomic office chair with lumbar support and adjustable height. Black mesh back with padded seat cushion. Perfect for long work sessions. Includes 5-year warranty.

title: Vintage Wooden Dining Table
description: Rustic farmhouse style dining table made from reclaimed oak wood. Seats 6 people comfortably. Natural wood finish with visible grain patterns. Dimensions: 72x36x30 inches.

title: Cozy Reading Chair Grey
description: Comfortable upholstered reading chair in soft grey fabric. Perfect for creating a cozy reading nook. Features wide armrests and plush cushioning. Matches well with modern and traditional decor.

title: LED Floor Lamp Adjustable
description: Modern LED floor lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Touch controls and remote included. Perfect for task lighting or ambient mood lighting. Energy efficient with 50000 hour lifespan.

title: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of 4 handcrafted ceramic coffee mugs in earth tones. Each mug holds 12oz and is microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for morning coffee or evening tea. Comes in gift box.

title: Minimalist Wall Mirror
description: Large rectangular wall mirror with thin black metal frame. Modern minimalist design perfect for entryways hallways or bedrooms. Dimensions: 36x24 inches. Easy wall mounting hardware included.

title: Soft Throw Blanket Beige
description: Ultra-soft fleece throw blanket in warm beige color. Perfect for snuggling on the couch or adding warmth to any room. Machine washable and wrinkle resistant. Size: 50x60 inches.

title: Bamboo Cutting Board Large
description: Eco-friendly bamboo cutting board with juice groove and non-slip feet. Naturally antimicrobial and gentle on knives. Perfect for food prep and serving. Dimensions: 18x12x1 inches.

title: Industrial Pendant Light
description: Industrial style pendant light with black metal shade and exposed Edison bulb. Perfect for kitchen islands dining areas or modern lofts. Adjustable cord length up to 72 inches.

title: Memory Foam Pillow
description: Premium memory foam pillow with cooling gel layer. Provides excellent neck and head support for all sleeping positions. Hypoallergenic bamboo cover included. Standard size 20x26 inches.

title: Wooden Bookshelf 5-Tier
description: Solid wood bookshelf with 5 adjustable shelves. Perfect for organizing books decorative items or storage boxes. Easy assembly with included hardware. Dimensions: 72x30x12 inches.

title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-wall insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free with leak-proof cap. Perfect for gym work or travel. 32oz capacity.

title: Decorative Table Runner
description: Elegant table runner with geometric pattern in navy blue and gold. Perfect for dining tables coffee tables or console tables. Machine washable polyester blend. Size: 72x13 inches.

title: Compact Desk Organizer
description: Multi-compartment desk organizer made from sustainable bamboo. Perfect for pens pencils paper clips and small office supplies. Helps keep workspace tidy and organized. Dimensions: 12x8x4 inches.

title: Aromatherapy Candle Set
description: Set of 3 soy wax aromatherapy candles in lavender vanilla and eucalyptus scents. Natural cotton wicks and essential oils. Burns for 40 hours each. Perfect for relaxation and stress relief.

title: Faux Leather Ottoman
description: Versatile faux leather ottoman that serves as extra seating or footrest. Hidden storage compartment inside. Rich brown color complements most furniture styles. Dimensions: 24x16x16 inches.

title: Smart LED Light Bulb
description: WiFi enabled smart LED bulb compatible with Alexa and Google Home. 16 million colors and adjustable brightness. Energy efficient and long lasting. Control via smartphone app.

title: Marble Cheese Board
description: Elegant white marble cheese board with gold handles. Perfect for entertaining and serving appetizers. Natural stone variations make each piece unique. Dimensions: 16x10x0.75 inches.

title: Velvet Accent Pillow
description: Luxurious velvet accent pillow in deep emerald green. Perfect for adding color and texture to sofas beds or chairs. Hidden zipper and removable cover for easy cleaning. Size: 18x18 inches.
